content.data: Then the king said this to Shukdev, then Shukdev while replying said this, “The same thing also occurred in the mind of Yudhishtar and he had asked Krishna the same thing and Krishna had also explained this mystery to Yudhishtar.”2254.
(ਉਸ ਨੇ) ਸ੍ਰੀ ਕ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਨ ਪਾਸੋ ਪੁਛਿਆ ਸੀ ਅਤੇ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਕ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਨ ਨੇ (ਸਾਰਾ) ਭੇਦ ਸੁਣਾਇਆ ਸੀ ॥੨੪੫੪॥
